Name: Earth
Fact: The third planet from the sun, also the densest planet in the Solar System and the largest of the four inner planets. Most importantly, the only planet known to harbor life. Earth's only satelite is the Moon.The Moon's gravitational interaction with Earth are what cause ocean tides. Due to its axis of rotation, Earth is able to produce seasonal variations on the planet's surface. A magnificent planet that we must all take better care of!
